title: Notice to 43 Congress leaders for anti-party activities in Bihar
text:
President of the party’s state disciplinary committee, Kapil Dev Prasad Yadav, said: “All the leaders are directed to submit a written clarification before the committee by noon on November 21."

The Congress has issued show-cause notices to 43 Bihar leaders for anti-party activities. Prominent among those who were issued the notice include former minister Veena Shahi, AICC member Madhurendra Kumar Singh, and former MLC Ajay Kumar Singh.

President of the party’s state disciplinary committee, Kapil Dev Prasad Yadav, said: “All the leaders are directed to submit a written clarification before the committee by noon on November 21. If the reply is not received within stipulated time, the committee will be constrained to take strict action, including expulsion from the primary membership of the party for six years.”
